name: Antistatic
description:
Antistatic is a crisp, uncompromising indie platform fighter. Simple for beginners, with a philosophy to emphasize depth and variety of play at all levels. Engage in local multiplayer matches as teams or as rivals.

Inside a crumbling digital world, atomic combatants carry out their programming in an endless series of battles over the remaining shielded landmarks.

Familiar mechanics — shields, directional influence, lag-canceling, grabs, wavedashing, and more
Full GameCube controller support — play on the best controller for platform fighters using the official adapter
5 characters — all with different play styles, and more coming over Early Access
10 stages — polish to be applied later
